mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SHUSER(ID, NAME, PWD, EMAIL, AUTH, DEL,ISENT,ENT,ENTNAME,POINT) VALUES (#{id},#{name},#{pwd},#{email},3, 0,#{isent}, (SELECT ent FROM SHENT WHERE ENTNAME=#{entname}),#{entname} null,null,0)
mapper.select: SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL, AUTH,ISENT,ENT,ENTNAME,POINT FROM SHUSER WHERE ID = #{id} AND PWD = #{pwd} AND DEL = 0
SELECT nvl(COUNT(*),0) FROM SHUSER WHERE ID=#{id}
SELECT ID, NAME, EMAIL,ENT,ENTNAME,POINT FROM SHUSER WHERE ENT=#{ent} AND DEL =0
mapper.update: UPDATE SHUSER SET POINT = POINT + #{epoint} WHERE ID= #{id}
